scripts.dev: node scripts/copy-audio.js && node scripts/optimise-images.js && node scripts/link-map.js && nuxt
scripts.generate: node scripts/copy-audio.js && node scripts/optimise-images.js && node scripts/link-map.js && nuxt generate
scripts.local: node scripts/copy-audio.js && node scripts/optimise-images.js && node scripts/link-map.js && nuxt generate && npm run start
